title: Someone from Riot can you please at least acknowledge the situation? Patch 6.6 fps issues with Mac.
body: There are several posts about this issue, can you guys respond to one of them so we know you at least know what is going on? Ever since the new patch I've had to play with the sound off just so I don't drop 5 frames per second during a team fight. It's nice to know that there's a solution, but playing with no sound is driving me crazy.

replies.body:
Hey everyone - 

While this isn't something I work on, I poked around in the bug database, and it appears we are aware of the issue and are in the process of working on a fix. I don't have much more info than that, but I wanted to keep everyone in the loop!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=rusyYEEa,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-03-28T18:11:52.860+0000)
>
> Hey everyone - 
> 
> While this isn't something I work on, I poked around in the bug database, and it appears we are aware of the issue and are in the process of working on a fix. I don't have much more info than that, but I wanted to keep everyone in the loop!

So long we know you guys have acknowledged the situation and haven't ignored us I think we can finally calm down about this and wait until there is a fix. Thanks for stopping by, really appreciate it.
i have the same issue, lost 5 ranked games stragith cause of it, turned sound off after, doesnt seem to do much trick, so sad pls fix it
I love riot but they really need to at least entertain the idea that this is an issue with 6.6 that they should look into
so many posts so little recognition
